mapper.select: select * from quotation where 1=1 and code = #{code}
select * from quotation where to_days(createTime) = to_days(now())
mapper.insert: insert into quotation ( code, quotationType, quotationID, schemeAmount, preferentialAmount, amountReceivable, amountReceived, uncollectedAmount, remarks, uploadContract, createName, createTime, updateName, updateTime ) values ( #{code}, #{quotationType}, #{quotationID}, #{schemeAmount}, #{preferentialAmount}, #{amountReceivable}, #{amountReceived}, #{uncollectedAmount}, #{remarks}, #{uploadContract}, #{createName}, NOW(), #{updateName}, NOW() )

insert into quotation ( code, quotationType, quotationID, schemeAmount, preferentialAmount, amountReceivable, amountReceived, uncollectedAmount, remarks, uploadContract, createName, createTime, updateName, updateTime ) values ( #{code}, #{quotationType}, #{quotationID}, #{schemeAmount}, #{preferentialAmount}, #{amountReceivable}, #{amountReceived}, #{uncollectedAmount}, #{remarks}, #{uploadContract}, #{createName}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateName}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} )
